content:
That's wonderful news! I'm so happy to hear that Luna is enjoying her new dental chews! Chewy.com is a great online pet supply store, and their fast shipping is definitely a plus.

It's great that you're taking proactive steps to support Luna's oral health. Dental care is such an important aspect of our pets' overall health, and it's fantastic that you're investing in her well-being.

How does Luna like the flavor and texture of the dental chews? Is she a fan of crunchy or soft treats?

Also, have you noticed any improvements in her oral health or behavior since starting the dental chews? I'm all ears!
